metadata.description: Celebrating the 25th anniversary of the classic cartoon serial, here comes AMAZING FRIENDS! In this one shot, a young Spidey's doing his darndest to find allies in his war against crime, but he didn't count on being matchmaker to two bickering heroes! Can the webslinger get Firestar to chill out and warm Iceman's heart...by setting them up on a date!?
metadata.name: Spider-Man Family: Amazing Friends
